query:
UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/logicc.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://logicc.ai' 
WHERE name = 'Logicc';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/plotdesk.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://plotdesk.com' 
WHERE name = 'Plotdesk';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/patris.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://patris.ai' 
WHERE name = 'patris.ai';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/amberai.jpg', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://amberai.de' 
WHERE name = 'amberAI';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/ai-ui.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://ai-ui.de' 
WHERE name LIKE '%AI-UI%' OR name LIKE '%AIVA%';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/openai.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://ka1.ai' 
WHERE name = 'ka1.ai';

UPDATE platforms SET 
  logoUrl = '/logos/openai.png', 
  websiteUrl = 'https://kamium.de' 
WHERE name = 'kamium';
